step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your elbows straighter as you reach overhead. Focus on opening your fingers wide.
In step 2, when making a fist and pushing down, really focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together. Keep your arms straight.
For step 3, as you stretch your arms back overhead, ensure you are exhaling fully and relaxing your muscles. Keep your arms extended.
In step 4, aim to keep your arms fully extended overhead and your fingers spread wide as you inhale and tighten your muscles.
For step 5, continue to focus on a full exhale and complete relaxation as you return your arms overhead.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms straight and fingers open when reaching up, and squeeze your shoulder blades together when making a fist.
